SEARCH
Package com.SuperheroSightings.springbootrestjdbctemplatemaven.dao

Interface HeroDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
HeroDAOImpl
public interface HeroDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing operations related to Heroes. This interface defines the standard operations to be performed on a Hero object. Implementations of this interface will provide concrete logic for these operations, interacting with the database.

  • Method Details

    • addHero

      Hero addHero(Hero hero)
      Creates a new Hero record.
      Parameters:
      hero - Hero object containing details of the hero to be created.
      Returns:
      Created hero with the assigned ID.

    • getHeroById

      Hero getHeroById(int id)
      Retrieves details of a specific hero identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the hero to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      Hero object with the specified ID.

    • getAllHeroes

      List<Hero> getAllHeroes()

      Returns:
      List of Hero objects.

    • updateHero

      Updates details of a specific hero.
      Parameters:
      hero - Hero object containing updated details.

    • deleteHeroById

      void deleteHeroById(int id)
      Deletes a specific hero identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the hero to be deleted.

    • getHeroesByOrganizationId

      Retrieves a list of heroes affiliated with a specific organization identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      organizationId - ID of the organization.
      Returns:
      List of Hero objects affiliated with the specified organization.

    • getHeroesByLocationId

      List<Hero> getHeroesByLocationId(int locationId)
      Retrieves a list of heroes sighted at a specific location identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      locationId - ID of the location.
      Returns:
      List of Hero objects sighted at the specified location.
